contentList.content: Unleash an icy wind, freezing enemies in place and dealing [1].
Breaths rotting fumes in a cone, dealing [1] and leaves cursed vapor behind.
Spew oil in a cone, dealing [1] and leaves sticky tar behind.

Murmur a forbidden secret to your enemies within 5m dealing [1] and cause their very spirit to become racked in torment from the knowledge.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Racked Spirit causes characters to take 10% bonus Piercing damage from all sources.---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enemies killed while suffering from Racked Spirit are pulled through the nether up to 10m away leaving a malformed corpse at the feet of an opponent which explodes dealing [2] in a 3m radius.

Deals [1] to enemies knocking them down and heals allies for [2] then drops rock shards on enemies dealing [3].
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If an enemy is knocked down during this period the shards will also apply Bleeding for 2 turns.
Breathes ice in a cone, dealing [1] and leaves frost behind.
Breaths lighting in a cone, dealing [1] and leaves electrified vapor behind.
Sprews poison in a cone, dealing [1] and leaves noxious bile behind.

Awaken countless malevolent spirits as a wave of torment dealing [1] and destory [2] to all enemies in its path.
Destructive power of the wave increases by +5% per meter traveled.

If enemies are suffering from Bleeding or Proliferate their blood becomes Desecrated causing an additional [4].
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Desecrated damage gains 50% bonus from both Strength and Intelligence.
Character has been coated with frozen oil and cannot move.

Time until the tide comes in...
It may be wise to seek shelter.
Universal school skill. Can be used by anyone.

These dark shrouded gloves fill the air with an unnatural feeling of dread as something not of this realm.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If a target has either no physical or no magic armor apply Drowning Dispair: A damage on move status that can randomly cause critical failures on the inflicted.

A torque of pure white ivory that emanates calm yet you can sense it sapping the warmth from your surroundings.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This amulet has a 33% chance when Frozen to instead release a wave putting enemies in a state of Icy Serenity.

Dull and grey, the runes carved on this phoenix-shaped idol are barely visible. Upon the base is etched 'Fear not death while flame burns in my heart.' Yet no flame glows. Perhaps there is a way to light it?
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This item cannot be crafted in-combat.

The one who consumes the heart of a Phoenix will be endoub with their power of resurrection.
Character will resurrect one time at full Vitality and Armor instead of drying.
This effect can only occur once, ever.

Caution: Potion will override all other resistance potions currently in effect.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This fortifying brew may reek of sour milk, but one gulp will grant you a minor resistance to all types of elemental magic.

Caution: Potion will override all other resistance potions currently in effect.

A surprisingly light spear with some type of sticky ooze dripping from it’s blades. The spear itself seems to phase and blur with movement.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
All attacks with this spear can Backstab including when it's thrown.

A surprisingly light spear with some type of sticky ooze dripping from it’s blades. The spear itself seems to phase and blur with movement.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
All attacks with this spear can Backstab including when it's thrown.

A perfectly balanced glistening blade of a pure Mythril that grants it's wielder power over rain and storm.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Each melee attack has a 30% chance on hit to summon a rain storm.
A military-issue longbow crafted from simple yet functional materials and emblazoned with the insignia of a long-extinct regiment.
Facened metal plates cold to the touch linked together with mythril rivets.
An ancient jar containing countless ghastly shades.
A focal point of raging energy...
Shiny enough to attract a magpie, sharp enough to kill it.
A sword of wit can dispel all doubts, a sword of metal can dispatch all enemies.
An ancient idol paying tribute to the chromatic dragons of old. You can sense a presence within.
A focal point of raging energy...
A military-issue longbow emblazoned with the insignia of a long-extinct Ancient Empire regiment.

A shadowy shroud of elegant silk that moves along the wind like wisps in the darkness.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Demonic Acuity: allows you to detect and control the vision of others. You reduce enemy stealth attacks by 30% and Blind those attackers for 1 turn through Magic Armor.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If another character is wearing Glaring Abyss. This helm will be imbued with its brother’s power.

A pristine plated great helm, dark as night. Faint whispers emanate from it's dark visage.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
When you end your turn, the nearest non-ally within 8m is forced to turn and meet your gaze. Abyssal Gaze: will emit a cone of pain in the target's direction 8m dealing piercing damage.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If another character is wearing Acumen of Sight. This helm will be imbued with its brother’s power.

Teaches all vanilla Grenade recipes.
Drop me if you want.

A platinum handled axe with serrated bone of some sort as used as its edge.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Grants the wielder immunity to Poison surfaces while absorbing them to restore Physical Armor.

Plated boots with a mirrored finish though it’s hard to make out much else since they seem to be on fire...
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Grants constant Elemental Affinity for fire damage skills. Does not stack with Talent given Affinity.

A bright band clasping a murky violet jewel.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cloud Mind: allows the wearer to remove themselves from the minds of enemies until the end of their first turn.
A shriveled claw taken from the Empress of Anguish. This wand allows all attacks and skills to inflict unresistable <font color='#C7A758'>Bleeding</font> on your victims.
Kept close, this skull ring will lend you the magic bestowed upon it.
Character reduces the first source of Physical or Elemental damage by 40% each turn.
Character reduces the first source of Physical or Elemental damage by 60% each turn.
Character reduces the first source of Physical or Elemental damage by 80% each turn.
Empress repays all pain to outsiders of her court with great severity.

Character is out of phase and protected against material plane damage sources.
Cannot be damaged by sources that are in-phase.
Burning status and fire damage is ignored.
Cleanses: Burning, Necrofire, Poisoned, Bleeding, Acid, Suffocating, Decaying, Diseased, Cursed, Chilled, Slowed, Virulent, Proliferate, Accelerant, Congeal, Rimefire.
Skirmish through up to four <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> dealing [1] each then return to your original location.
|Summon a mechanical bomber at the target point. The bomber can explode, dealing fire damage and producing a fire surface.|
Can be cast while invisible or sneaking. Range: [1]
Slows down a target and deals [1] damage.
Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.
Target terrain to create a smokescreen. Deals no damage.

Soar sylph imbued wind through the air to target location. Fire arrows down on all <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> within your path dealing [1]. Land with a crushing wind shear dealing [2] to all <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> within 2m.

Throw an explosive trap at a target location. If the trap is not detonated by proximity it deals [1]. The trap takes 1 turn to activate. While active the trap will deal [2] when a <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> is near or approaches it.
Fire an arrow dealing [1] summoning a shadow clone near the <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> struck. The clone has rogue abilities, heightened threat and scales with your Summoning skill.
Throw a flurry of five daggers dealing [1] damage each.
Barrage all nearby <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> with necrotic energy bolts dealing [1].

Sacrifice 25% of your Maximum Vitality cleansing Bleeding and Proliferate then afflict your enemies instead. Unleash accursed blood from your veins dealing [1] over three hits.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The lashing of blood will spread onto 2 enemies within 6m.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If a corpse is targeted it will contaminate the blood producing a cloud. Contaminated blood applies Silence and Decaying.

Throw an explosive trap at a target location. If the trap is not detonated by proximity it deals [1]. The trap takes 1 turn to activate. While active the trap will deal [2] when a <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> is near or approaches it.

Deal [1], [2] and [3] to an enemy siphoning it away and giving 150% the value to yourself or a chosen ally.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This skill will restore and cure regardless of the target's current Armor / HP values.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Removes Acid, Suffocating, Knocked Down, Frozen and Bleeding from the recipient who gains +15% Earth Resistance and Water Resistance for 1 turn.
Propel three volatile globs at chosen locations dealing [1] to <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> in a [2] radius each producing poisonous clouds on impact and applying Acid.
Hurl a jagged shard of ice at an <font color='#D7001F'>enemy</font> dealing [1] and [2] that pierces through to other <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font>.
Leap through the air to a destination crushing <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> when landing for [1].
Leap through the air to a destination crushing <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> when landing for [1].

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(Intended Conflux Status: Virulent)

Using magic skills will charge the staff allowing this effect to be used at no AP cost.

Carpet three target areas with an exploding forking barrage of 5 missiles each dealing [1]. The unique nature of this skill causes aerial bombs to both fork and explode on <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> hitting any location with considerable firepower.
Hurl an otherworldly mimic of your harpoon at a target dealing [1] that explodes on impact in a 2m radius. This attack can Backstab.

Transform into a cyclone of spinning blades to each of three chosen locations in order. You will barrel through all enemies in your path dealing [1] each time you start a new spin until ending at the last chosen location.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
One-Handed weapons have a 2m radius while Two-Handed have a 3m radius.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Characters cannot block the targetting of this skill. You avoid surfaces while moving.
|Electric bolt falls from the sky, dealing [1] damage to characters and items in the area. Sets status Shocked, which reduces Turn AP by 1.|

Break the earth apart causing a chain reaction of erupting oily earth and corrosive fumes on characters in a 4m radius dealing [1].
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If targets in the area are already afflicted with Acid then instead of applying Acid cause a Corrosion Catalyst to occur melting through Armor instantly with an intensity based on the combined Acid turns.
Raise and launch 20 conductive crystalline formations at <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> in a 5m area dealing [1] each then arc electricity through them for [2] as they explode dealing [3].
Raise and launch 20 conductive crystalline formations at <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> in a 5m area dealing [1] each then arc electricity through them for [2] as they explode dealing [3].

Create a sudden formation of pyrocomulus above a 4m radius blasting characters with incendiary wind and fire induced lightning rapidly dealing [1] and [2] over four strikes.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(Intended Conflux Status: Accelerant)

Invoke inferno and rime splitting the earth in a 5m radius dealing [1] three times then summon a comet from the stars dealing [2] to all characters.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(Intended Conflux Status: Proliferate)

Evoke a meteoric storm from the stars. Debris from the meteors will randomly scar the area in a 4m radius dealing [1]. Shortly after, molten meteorites will strike all <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> in the area dealing [2] igniting and burning everything in their wake.

Evoke a pillar of divine fire in a 3m radius dealing [1] to enemies in the area and healing allies for [2].
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enemy Undead in the area are harmed by the healing of this skill while allies are unaffected.
Character is hemorrhaging for [1] each turn.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(Intended Conflux Status: Accelerant)

Condition your skin against any element gaining resistance and properties of that element until you morph your skin again.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gain 30% resistance of a chosen skin type with a Penalty -10% against its opposite.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Any time you are struck by melee attacks your skin will react causing status of the chosen element to afflict the target.

Loose a tremorous shout dealing [1] to enemies and remove movement impairing effects.
Gain Berserk Rampage allowing you to charge a target area dealing [2] in a 1m wide rush.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
After a rush, slam the ground around you in rage dealing [3] in a 2m radius. Each enemy you strike during your rush increases the radius of this attack by +1 up to a maximum of 5m.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(Requires: Two-Handed Weapon)
Insulate yourself and nearby <font color='#11D77A'>allies</font> from the Elements granting +15% resistance against Fire, Earth, Water, Air damage and Poison.

Briefly fracture the material plane causing an explosion of energy dealing [1] in a 5m radius to <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> while pulling three Ataraxian through the veil as your servants.
Reveal <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> within [1] and prevent them from going invisible. Enemies engulfed in the shimmering cloud suffer 20% dodge penalty for the duration.
Emit an aura up to 8m in radius granting you and <font color='#11D77A'>allies</font> within [1] as additional weapon damage.

Flame is the source of your strength and the fall of your enemies.
Passive: When you are Burning from fire or Necrofire gain +1AP recovery per turn and +1 Movement.

Active: Consume your built up flames and explode for [1] setting intense burning for [2] to enemies in a 5m radius that cannot be resisted. Damage is increased by 75% for each turn removed to a maximum 300%.
Become a thunderous beacon of lightning for you and allies causing melee attacks to wildly arc electricity to nearby enemies with each hit.
Become an arctic force for you and allies causing melee attacks to shatter ice hurling it towards nearby enemies with each hit.

Nothing within 5m can withstand the bitter chill of your presence.
Passive: You are immune to Frozen, Slipping and leave Frozen surfaces in your wake.
Passive: Enemies within your Permafrost aura cannot resists Chill status and have 15% reduce movement.

Active: Release an Icy Nova dealing [1] to enemies within 5m while siphoning Chill from allies. Enemies affected by Chill, Frozen or Congeal burst additional novas in a 3m radius
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Damage of each nova is increased based on the number of Cold effects. Chill increases +50% Congeal and Frozen increase by +100% to a maximum of 150%.

-Discipline-
Set a reactive position creating a 6m attack radius around you. You will automatically attack enemies who enter or start their turn in this area with your melee weapon dealing [1].
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
While in this Discipline you cannot move and remain unwavering to movement effects including Teleport, Knocked Down, Crippled and Slowed.

Become a conduit of electric power.
Passive: Your Suffocation status reduces Elemental Resistances by 5%.
Passive: Allies will not be shocked or stunned by skills or surfaces you control.

Toggle: Enemies shocked by you become sapped taking 20% increased damage from DoT effects.
Toggle: Electrify surfaces when activated, by moving or standing in them.

Earth bends to your will and poison cannot be whistood.
Passive: Oil has the opposite effect granting you +2m Movement and +10% Dodge
Passive: Enemy undead cannot fully resist your poison damage or statuses and always take 50% of its potency.
Passive: Acid status you inflict reduces a character's physical resistance by 5%.

Toggle: Transform your affinity of earth losing the ability to reverse the effects of oil but causing all Earth damage to instead deal equivalent Physical damage.

Change the base damage type of the weapon you're currently holding in your main hand.
If you wish to use this function on more than one weapon simply equip it to your main hand.
Weapons can be changed an unlimited number of times.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Characters without this talent cannot use morphed weapons.

Overload with arcane power adding +25% bonus damage to your next magical attack or +35% to your next ranged attack.

Enable / Disable NPC Talent Injection?
This feature adds Talents specific to different enemy archetypes and alters their stats, skills or weapons accordingly. Just as a player would. The number and weight of talents added will increase as NPC level increases.
(This feature can be turned On or Off at any time.)

Enable / Disable NPC Talent Injection (Extreme) ?
This feature adds Talents just as the normal Talent Injector option. However the number of Talents at lower levels is heavily increased and enemies get additional perks like +2 starting AP, increased attributes, base range increase, base movement increase or permanent buffs.
(This feature can be turned On or Off at any time.)

"Speak the word of essence that represents our kin and I shall bestow their boom upon you."

So foolish...
This place is a tomb, not a place of worship. I am the god of magic!
... I sense what you are and it will not be tolerated!

Ah...
Demon tenacity knows no bounds. My children have ripped part of me through the planes. Your mortal souls are not good enough for keeping...
You will see pure annihilation!

Kraven. Are you done with that anvil? We have guests, I said.
Now don't be rude. Let us make room for our new friends...

I'm sure they will make a fantastic addition to our home...
As soul reliquires.

Shall we brother?
I've grown quite an appetite and can't wait to see how their souls look in our home!

Well, look at this.
It seems we have visitors to our humble dwelling already. We are hardly furnished for guests but I'm certain we can make accommodations for you.
Your efforts to save the paladin are commendable and I shall wait allowing him to depart. However...
Failure to save the paladin only furthers my contempt...
Your transgressions cannot be allowed to go any further!
Morph your weapon to a chosen Element...
I am the true god of magic and I do not accept prayers. Only your source...
You seek an empty tomb of unanswered prayers.
